description: When attempting to create a metaclass using a bytearray, an error is raised stating "TypeError: metaclasses must be derived from type". This occurs because a bytearray is not a valid type for a metaclass.
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 4, in <module>
TypeError: metaclass conflict: the metaclass of a derived class must be a (non-strict) subclass of the metaclasses of all its bases
